meanings.definition: To manage or direct (a business, organization, etc.)
meanings.sent1: She administrates the daily operations of the company.
meanings.sent2: The CEO administrates the entire organization efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The cat administrates the household, making sure everyone is fed on time.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor administrates a sense of order in the chaotic office.
meanings.sent5: The teacher administrates the classroom with a firm but fair approach.

meanings.definition: To carry out or put into effect (a plan, policy, etc.)
meanings.sent1: He administrates the new safety protocols in the workplace.
meanings.sent2: The government administrates the new law to improve public health.
meanings.sent3: The robot administrates the task flawlessly, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile administrates a positive change in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The software administrates the updates automatically, saving time for users.
